title: Accessibility problems
description: When opening the Help view, I need to first click on one of the "live" areas (e.g., the banner with the tool buttons, the nav frame, or the content frame) before it starts working. This means that keyboard navigation is not possible immediately upon opening the Help view.
OB: After opening the Help view, I have to click on one of the "live" areas (e.g., the banner with the tool buttons, the nav frame, or the content frame) before I can navigate it using the keyboard.
EB: The Help view should be navigable via the keyboard immediately after opening it, without the need to first click on a "live" area.
SR:
1. Open the Help view.
2. Attempt to navigate it using the keyboard without clicking on any specific area.
3. Observe that keyboard navigation is not possible until clicking on one of the "live" areas (e.g., the banner with the tool buttons, the nav frame, or the content frame).
